article_text:
One bill would allow people to contract directly with doctors to pay for primary care

Another bill would create sweeping price transparency requirements

A third would protect consumers from “balance billing,’’ a practice by doctors to bill patients for services not covered by insurance

article_metadata.title: Florida House passes ‘free-market’ healthcare options | Miami Herald

og.description: The House passed several healthcare bills with broad support from Republicans and Democrats
og.title: Florida House passes ‘free-market’ healthcare options
